amendment.description: Amendment adds a new title to the bill which requires the tracking and reporting of all payments issued pursuant to the Equal Access to Justice Act (EAJA) and establishes a publicly available, online searchable database to access information regarding EAJA payments and the parties involved in the adjudicatory action leading to an EAJA payment.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 23 printed in Part B of House Report 112-616 to add a new Title to the bill requiring the tracking and reporting of all payments issued pursuant to the Equal Access to Justice Act (EAJA). Would establish a publicly available, online searchable database to access information regarding EAJA payments and the parties involved in the adjudicatory action leading to an EAJA payment.
